adrFormatAddress: 55 East 86th St, New York, NY 10028-1059, USA

originalText.text: DO NOT SEE THIS MAN. It has been 1.5 years since I had a simple knee arthroscopy to remove cysts in my knee and I am much worse off after receiving surgery from Dr. Rose than I ever was before seeing him. I have spoken to 6 other professional dancers who recently got knee surgery from him and they are all also facing major complications and are worse off because of him. This man is a monster and needs to retire. My career may never look the same because of him. He needs to take responsibility for what he is doing to patients instead of dismissing them with one leg out the door.

originalText.text: I am extremely pleased with the entire office staff, Dr. Rose’s experience and final result. I had a ACL reconstruction and meniscus repair performed by Dr. Rose. Had all my questions answered and concerns addressed prior and after surgery. Anytime I had a question, would always get a callback from PA or front office staff to resolve it. Clean office, very short wait times, very professional staff and quick turnaround on all processes. Dr. Rose is extremely experienced and his confident demeanor and encouragement left me without a doubt of who to use for my knee surgery. Fantastic results. I highly recommend!

originalText.text: Dr. Rose is a wealth of knowledge. He is a surgeon who will try to avoid doing surgery and opt for the least invasive option. We had been to literally 5 very well respected orthopedic surgeons in Manhattan. Dr. Rose was able to figure out the cause of my daughter's foot problem after 3 years of pain and despair. We are so very grateful. We are 6 weeks in to a physical therapy program and we are finally seeing results and headed in the right direction.

text.text: Dr. Rose is a wealth of knowledge. He is a surgeon who will try to avoid doing surgery and opt for the least invasive option. originalText.text: I can't express how appreciative I am of Dr. Rose.  He is extremely thorough and had been recommended to me by numerous friends and colleagues, for good reason.  After getting conflicting advisement from another orthopedic, I went to Dr. Rose and immediately got solid insight and clarification. I trust him completely.  My shoulder surgery went smoothly and he and his assistant, Sean, are very gracious and patient with care and follow-up.  Dr. Rose said to me, regarding my injury, "This is easy to fix!" and with that assured ease, he made everything else easier as well.  Very grateful.

originalText.text: Dr. Rose took excellent care of my knee. He’s very thorough and compassionate. Shawn his PA, is awesome and always answers my emails and helps me with any paperwork for my workers comp case. Maria and Gissette have also been very helpful with me getting the treatments I needed approved/scheduled. This is a wonderful team and I highly recommend them! THANK YOU all!
